nciThesaurus.definition: A radioimmunoconjugate comprised of the humanized monoclonal antibody clivatuzumab, directed against the pancreatic cancer antigen MUC1, that is conjugated to the chelating agent tetraxetan and radiolabeled with the beta-emitting radioisotope Yttrium Y 90. Yttrium Y 90 clivatuzumab tetraxetan binds to tumor cells expressing MUC1 antigen, thereby selectively delivering a cytotoxic dose of beta radiation.
synonyms: Yttrium Y 90 DOTA Monoclonal Antibody HuPAM4
yttrium Y 90 DOTA monoclonal antibody HuPAM4
